short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome add-on to “warm up” a freshly started Dynamics 365 FSCM system

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Microsoft Dynamics FSCM Warm-Up Extension is designed to boost your productivity by speed up the initial startup process for Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance and Supply Chain Management (FSCM) background processes. With this extension, you can predefine a set of tabs that are essential for your workflow and open them all at once, reducing the time spent navigating through the system.

Key Features:

Customizable Tabs: Easily configure which tabs to open upon startup to suit your specific needs.

One-Click Warm-Up: Open all predefined tabs with a single click to get your system ready for work.

User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive interface for setting up and managing your tabs.

Enhanced Productivity: Save time and improve efficiency by quickly accessing necessary parts of Microsoft Dynamics FSCM.

Seamless Integration: Works seamlessly within the Chrome browser, providing a smooth user experience.
